description: This file defines a React context and provider for managing notes within a note-taking application. It includes types, reducer logic, context setup, and custom hooks for CRUD operations on notes.

methods.name: notesReducer
methods.description: Reducer function handling note actions such as add, update, delete, toggle pin, and reset.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note with provided title, content, and optional color; alerts if both title and content are empty.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new title, content, color, and pinned status; alerts if both title and content are empty.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

methods.name: togglePin
methods.description: Toggles the pinned status of a note by its ID, and sorts notes to keep pinned ones at the top.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the notes state to the initial state.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: Custom React hook providing access to notes context, ensuring it is used within a NotesProvider.
